General.Name: Celulosa Argentina SA
General.Description: Celulosa Argentina S.A. operates in the forest industry sector in Argentina, Uruguay, and internationally. The company offers printing and writing paper, tissue paper, and packaging paper under the BOREAL, BOREALCEL, BOOKCEL, SPRING CEL, PAINTCEL, and PAMPA brands. It is also involved in cellulosic Pulp, and wood and distribution business. Celulosa Argentina S.A. was founded in 1929 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Celulosa Argentina S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Tapebicua Investment Company S.L.
General.Address: Av. Santa Fe 1821, Buenos Aires, Argentina, C1123AAA
